question: The Gini coefficient is a commonly used measure of the degree of inequality in an income distribution. Which among the following statements will be true for a Gini Coefficient of 1?
option2: All the income is received by the top 20% of the income distribution.
option3: The income is split equally between the top 20% and the rest of the distribution.
option4: One family has all the income and everyone else has nothing.
answer: One family has all the income and everyone else has nothing.
